name: Crossover House
description:
You are a normal everyday guy who wakes up one day, only to find himself in an unknown house, floating in the middle of a strange, endless void. Why are you there? Why is this house there? What secrets does it hold? These questions and more are the mysteries that you must try to figure out during your unspecified-amount-of-time stay at this strange house. 

And this is only just the beginning. 

Multiple characters from various popular franchises are also mysteriously arriving into the house, and they are just as confused as you are. You must all learn how to work together and get along with one another if you want to have any hope of escaping the house. Or you could end up being trapped there, forever.

FEATURES:

-A unique point-and-click visual novel game created entirely in Google Slides! (Yes, it's possible)

-Interact and team up with your favorite pop-culture characters, including Tracer from Overwatch, Noah from Total Drama, and more!

-A fully functional and easy to use Map System that allows you to travel around to different rooms in the house!

- A fully functional Inventory System!

-A fully functional Character Tracker system where you can find out info on all the different residents in the house and get hints on how to progress on each character's independent storyline!

-Multiple puzzles and mini-games to complete!

-Various things to interact with!

-An engaging storyline!

-And more!

IMPORTANT!:

Seeing as this game was made originally in Google Slides, it is FRAGILE! Please read the "How To Play" section after downloading the game to ensure that your gameplay does not get messed up.

I own none of the images used in this game. All characters belong to their original owners.
